channel.title: Equipment Requirements. [RESOLVED]
channel.description:
OK, on my server, I've added the skillcapes and skillcape emotes for all the combat skills by using the GetCLAttack etc, but how do i set requirements for equipment that doesn't have a GetCL? Any ideas?
Many Thanks,
Syrillia.[br][size=1]Posted on: 06-11-2007, 18:02:49[/size][hr]Never mind, I did it all by myself! I'm on roll!
